Class TicketPool

java.lang.Object
com.ticketing.RealimeTicketingSystem_backend.Components.TicketPool
@Component public class TicketPool extends Object
TicketPool class to manage the tickets in the system. For adding and removing tickets, and keeping track of the total tickets released and sold. Provides synchronized methods to add and remove tickets.

    Method to enable websocket messaging.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Configuration config)
      Method to initialize the ticket pool with the user configuration. Clears the existing tickets and adds the initial tickets.
      Parameters:
      config - (user configuration)

    • addTickets

      public boolean addTickets(String vendorId, int numTickets)
      Method to add tickets to the pool from a vendor. Checks if the pool has reached the maximum capacity, and stops vendor release.
      Parameters:
      vendorId - (vendor identifier)
      numTickets - (number of tickets to add)
      Returns:
      (true if tickets are added, false if not)

    • removeTickets

      public boolean removeTickets(String customerId, int numTickets)
      Method to remove tickets from the pool for a customer. Checks if all tickets are sold, and returns false. Checks if there are enough tickets and all have been released, and returns false.
      Parameters:
      customerId - (customer identifier)
      numTickets - (number of tickets to remove)
      Returns:
      (true if tickets are removed, false if not)

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete()
      Method to check if the ticket pool is complete.
      Returns:
      (true if all tickets are sold, false if not)

    • areAllTicketsReleased

      public boolean areAllTicketsReleased()
      Method to get the total tickets released.
      Returns:
      (total tickets released)

    • areAllTicketsSold

      public boolean areAllTicketsSold()
      Method to get the total tickets sold.
      Returns:
      (total tickets sold)

    • getTotalTicketsReleased

      public int getTotalTicketsReleased()
      Method to get the total tickets released.
      Returns:
      (total tickets released)

    • getRemainingTickets

      public int getRemainingTickets()
      Method to get the remaining tickets in the pool.
      Returns:
      (remaining tickets)
